newsitem.title: USA: Premier Laser leads group in acquisition.
newsitem.headline: Premier Laser leads group in acquisition.

text.p: Premier Laser Systems Inc on Thursday said it is leading a group who have signed a letter of intent to purchase Illinois-based Medical Laser Institute of America (MLIA).
Medical Laser, operator of one cosmetic laser surgery center in Chicago with growth plans in Illinois and California, is owned by Canadian-based Mattan Corp.

Premier Laser, a maker of proprietary medical lasers, said it acquired Mattan common stock in 1996. Under the deal, the acquiring group will exchange shares of Mattan it owns for Medical Laser and Mattan will remain a privately-held company.
